item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

26. Redbox left PII on decommissioned machines (269 points | 136 comments)

28. Mt Rainier Elevation Survey (31 points | 6 comments)
29. CapibaraZero: A cheap alternative to FlipperZero based on ESP32-S3 (363 points | 77 comments)
